s1: Real-world data are commonly messy, distributed, and heterogeneous.

s1: This course introduces core concepts of data cleaning, standardisation, and data integration, that are aimed at converting and mapping raw data into other formats that allow more efficient and convenient use and analysis of data. The courses also discusses data quality, management, and storage issues as relevant to data analytics.
s2: Critically assess and compare philosophical views on issues arising from elementary logic.
